desc: We’re an award-winning international media company, looking for a technical and analytical thinker to manage our e-newsletter delivery from a strategic and practical perspective. The successful candidate will have an understanding of newsletter delivery systems, data, vertical business markets, business media and publishing.The role involves:• analyzing the delivery statistics of our e-newsletters• troubleshooting analytics relating to click-rates, bounce rates and reader behaviour• providing instructions to our technical and support teams (including outsourced resources) and monitoring their progress• collaborating at a global and cross-functional level with management, IT, admin, marketing, sales, editorial and customer service to drive our data strategies• ensuring that our multiple databases are composed of the accurate details of high-level decision makers in key niche markets• working across industries, continents, products and markets to drive database growth that supports our commercial business strategiesThe successful candidate will be:• knowledgeable about e-newsletter sending platforms (Pinpoint, Greenarrow and Mailchimp)• highly technically competent, with excellent problem solving skills• able to monitor newsletters and alert relevant internal stakeholders across the world if there are issues with numbers dropping• someone who can spot trends in deliverability and spikes in bounces• able to analyse WHY problems or trends exist• interested in B2B magazine and online publishing• a global citizen, able to research and understand niche business markets across the world• someone who can think strategically, analytically and pragmaticallyIt would also be helpful if you are• an Excel wiz, capable of analysing complex data to pivot table level
title: Email Deliverability Analyst

desc: ccomplishes marketing and sales human resource objectives by recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions; planning and reviewing compensation actions; enforcing policies and procedures.Achieves marketing and sales operational objectives by contributing marketing and sales information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; preparing and completing action plans; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; completing audits; identifying trends; determining system improvements; implementing change.Meets marketing and sales financial objectives by forecasting requirements; preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions.Determines annual and gross-profit plans by forecasting and developing annual sales quotas for regions; projecting expected sales volume and profit for existing and new products; analyzing trends and results; establishing pricing strategies; recommending selling prices; monitoring costs, competition, supply, and demand.Accomplishes marketing and sales objectives by planning, developing, implementing, and evaluating advertising, merchandising, and trade promotion programs; developing field sales action plans.Identifies marketing opportunities by identifying consumer requirements; defining market, competitor's share, and competitor's strengths and weaknesses; forecasting projected business; establishing targeted market share.
